Hymn.Arabic: فَدَعَا بِيلاَطُسُ رُؤَسَاءَ الْكَهَنَةِ وَالْعُظَمَاءَ وَالشَّعْبَ
Hymn.English: 13 Then Pilate, when he had called together the chief priests, the rulers, and the people

Hymn.Arabic: وَقَالَ لَهُمْ: «قَدْ قَدَّمْتُمْ إِلَيَّ هَذَا الرجلَ كَمَنْ يُضِلُّ الشَّعْبَ. وَهَا أَنَا قَدْ فَحَصْتُه أمامَكُمْ وَلَمْ أَجِدْ فِيهِ عِلَّةً مِمَّا تَشْتَكُونَ بِهِ عَلَيْهِ.
Hymn.English: 14 said to them, “You have brought this Man to me, as one who misleads the people. And indeed, having examined Him in your presence, I have found no fault in this Man concerning those things of which you accuse Him;

Hymn.Arabic: بَل وَلاَ هِيرُودُسُ أَيْضاً لأَنَّهُ قد أَرْسَلَهُ إِلَيْنَا. وَهَاهُوَّذا لمْ يصنعَ شَيئاً يَسْتَحِقُّ عَليهِ الْمَوْتَ
Hymn.English: 15 no, neither did Herod, for I sent you back to him; and indeed nothing deserving of death has been done by Him.
16 I will therefore chastise Him and release Him”

Hymn.Arabic: وَكَانَ لابُدَّ لَهُ أَنْ يُطْلِقَ لَهُمْ فى كُلِّ عِيدٍ أسيراً
Hymn.English: 17 (for it was necessary for him to release one to them at the feast).

Hymn.Arabic: فَصَرَخُوا بِجُمْلَتِهِمْ قَائِلِينَ: «إرفَعْ هَذَا وَأَطْلِقْ لَنَا بَارَابَاسَ!»
Hymn.English: 18 And they all cried out at once, saying, “Away with this Man, and release to us Barabbas”—

Hymn.Arabic: وَذَاكَ كَانَ قَدْ أُلقِىَ فِي السِّجْنِ لأَجْلِ فِتْنَةٍ حَدَثَتْ فِي الْمَدِينَةِ وَقَتْلٍ.
Hymn.English: 19 who had been thrown into prison for a certain rebellion made in the city, and for murder.

Hymn.Arabic: فَنَادَاهُمْ أَيْضاً بِيلاَطُسُ وَهُوَ يُرِيدُ أَنْ يُطْلِقَ يَسُوعَ
Hymn.English: 20 Pilate, therefore, wishing to release Jesus, again called out to them.
21 But they shouted, saying, “Crucify Him, crucify Him!”

Hymn.Arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ مرَّةً ثَالِثَةً: «وَأَيَّ شَرٍّ عَمِلَ هَذَا ؟ إِنِّي لَمْ أَجِدْ فِيهِ عِلَّةً لِلْمَوْتِ فَأَنَا أُؤَدِّبُهُ وَأُطْلِقُهُ».
Hymn.English: 22 Then he said to them the third time, “Why, what evil has He done? I have found no reason for death in Him. I will therefore chastise Him and let Him go.”

Hymn.Arabic: وَأمِّا هُمْ فَألحُّوا عَلَيهِ بِأَصْوَاتٍ عَالِيَةٍ أَنْ يَصْلِبَهُ. وَإشتدتْ أَصْوَاتُهُمْ.
Hymn.English: 23 But they were insistent, demanding with loud voices that He be crucified. And the voices of these men and of the chief priests prevailed.
24 So Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they requested.

Hymn.Arabic: فَأَطْلَقَ لَهُمُ الَّذِي طَلَبُوهُ ذَاكَ الَّذِي أُلقِىَ فِي السِّجْنِ لأَجْلِ فِتْنَةٍ وَقَتْلٍ وَأَسْلَمَ يَسُوعَ لِإرادَتِهِمْ.
Hymn.English: 25 And he released to them the one they requested, who for rebellion and murder had been thrown into prison; but he delivered Jesus to their will.
